column4: hello i hav a problem in using torrents in ubuntu that is i m unable to load any ebooks can any one say me the solution for it??

bazhang:ok 5n thanxx
wols:what's this iptables -L can u xplain it ?
iptables -L is to list the rules in the firewall at the moment
https://help.ubuntu.com/community/IptablesHowTo
ubuntu by default has no firewall rules
: then what's the prob that im unable to use the torents for d/l??
do you have a router?
are you in a protected network, like in a university etc,
:no
try a torrent from mininova.org , could be the tracker need authentication

deluge
